Articles.Content:
I've just discovered the old ReflectiveShader mod, and I desperately want someone to update it so I can add some reflective-ness to the IXS-Class Warpship and Spacedocks mod (Stevie\_D/\_Agustus\_)

P.S. I've noticed Starwaster's ReflectiveShader continued, but it won't work in 0.90.

> 
> I've just discovered the old ReflectiveShader mod, and I desperately want someone to update it so I can add some reflective-ness to the IXS-Class Warpship and Spacedocks mod (Stevie\_D/\_Agustus\_)
> P.S. I've noticed Starwaster's ReflectiveShader continued, but it won't work in 0.90.

Texture Replacer can add real reflections to parts.

I've been using Starwaster's mod. It works fine in .90 with ships in the FASA mod, for instance.

That said, I had a really difficult time trying to paint my own parts to have a "nice" reflective texture.

I wasn't aware of Texture Replacer (in my mind this was something more to do with memory management).
